[The Vass] Do not underestimate Vass vessels based on stats alone; their passive time distortion effect turns them considerably faster and deadlier than they appear at first glance.
[The Vass] While the Families mostly treat each other as equals, or at the very least close in power, the near-mythological leader of Accel stands out among the rest as a figure of power.
[The Vass] The Families do not take kindly to looters and thieves, and will go to great lengths to hide the secrets of their products.
